mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, USER_NM as userNm, USER_DT_CD as userDtCd, USE_YN as useYN, USE_PWD as userPwd, ST_DT as StDt, ED_DT as EdDt, U.PRT_CD as PrtCd, PWD_UPD_DT as PwdUpdDt, U.FST_REG_DT as FstRegDt, U.FST_USER_ID as FstUserId, U.LST_UPD_DT as LstUpdCd, U.LST_UPD_ID as LstUpdId, PRT_NM as PrtNm FROM MA_USER_MT U LEFT JOIN MA_PRT_MT P ON (U.PRT_CD=P.PRT_CD) WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND USE_PWD=#{userPwd} AND USE_YN='Y'
